channel.title: Projects on Hello there! :) I'm Arun.
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Hello there! :) I'm Arun.

item.title: Defensive Distillation
item.description: Defensive Distillation is an implementation based on the seminal paper, enhancing the robustness of deep neural networks against adversarial attacks. This technique involves training a “student” model on perturbed data produced by a “teacher” model to improve defense against gradient-based attacks. Key highlights include: Utilizing TensorFlow and the MNIST dataset. Demonstrating increased resilience through distillation, with a slight trade-off in accuracy. Successfully defending against FGSM adversarial attacks. For a deeper dive into Defensive Distillation’s impact on model robustness, visit the project repository.

item.title: Song Recommendation Engine
item.description: This project focuses on creating a personalized song recommendation system. It demonstrates the application of machine learning techniques to analyze and suggest songs based on user preferences. It’s a perfect example of how data can be used to enhance user experience in the domain of music. click here to know more

item.title: Fry the Brain
item.description: Math is fun when done the fun way! “Fry The Brain” challenge is a stimulating mobile game that tests your arithmetic prowess under the pressure of a ticking clock. Solve as many problems as you can, climb the leaderboard, and invite friends to join the fray. Whether you’re honing your skills or taking on the ultimate number challenge, “Fry The Brain” is your playground for numerical mastery. Excited for the Math Craze?

item.title: First Person Shooter
item.description: This First-Person Shooter game, developed in Unity, showcases my expertise in game design and programming. The project features engaging gameplay, advanced graphics, and interactive environments, emphasizing real-time action and character control. Below is a prototype video demonstrating the gameplay experience. Explore more about this project

item.title: Triangles
item.description: Dive into the retro gaming universe with my 2D Top-Down Shooter, a game that brings a modern twist to the classic arcade shooter genre. Featuring minimalist design and intuitive touch controls, the game challenges players to navigate a sleek battlefield represented by a starry backdrop and geometric adversaries. Health bars and scores are displayed with a clean, unobtrusive UI, allowing for an immersive gaming experience. Engage in this arcade-style combat and enjoy a contemporary take on retro gaming.
